changelog.change: [Fix] Change user-colour on newest-pgallery-entry in config (Bug #716)
[Fix] Add a last check to avoid the adm/mods/-file issue
[Fix] Fix SQL-Error when viewing search_id=contests and having no permissions at all. (Bug #710)
[Fix] Configuration is missing number of rates as sort-key-option
[Fix] View image on editing and commenting images in subsilver2 (Bug #660)
[Fix] install/ not using append_sid() and not checking for User-Status (Bug #699, thanks to Desdenova)
[Fix] Sort images by upload-time on albums, when rating is the same. (Bug #702)
[Fix] Do not activate already finished contests, while editing the album. (Bug #688)
[Fix] Allow users to be member of no group
[Fix] Support phpBB::3.0.6 "New groups option to excempt group leaders from group permissions" (Bug #703)
[Fix] Correctly describe what to do on converting (Bug #700)
[Fix] Incorrect label for "IP/Whois" and "Edit Comment" Buttons (Bug #701)
[Fix] Can not rotate images by 90°/270° when resize is deactivated.
[Fix] "Undefined variable"-Error on rotating while editing image (Bug #690)
[Fix] Wrong language-strings on "copy permissions"-feature (Bug #689)
[Fix] Typo in german language-pack (Bug #687)
[Feature] View captcha for guests when uploading images and posting comments (Bug #705)
[Feature] Option to sort albums with other default value (Bug #692)
[Feature] User-Option to view exif data by default (Bug #681)
[Feature] Option to disable the watermark for certain albums completly (Bug #684)

action-group.diy-instructions:
Rufe install/ auf und führe das Update-Script aus
Leere den Cache im "Administrations-Bereich" (ACP) > "Allgemein" > "Den Cache leeren"
Aktualisiere deine Styles: "Administrations-Bereich" (ACP) > "Styles" > "Templates" > jedes > "Aktualisieren" "Administrations-Bereich" (ACP) > "Styles" > "Themes" > jedes > "Aktualisieren" "Administrations-Bereich" (ACP) > "Styles" > "Grafiksammlungen" > jedes > "Aktualisieren"

Browse to install/ and run the update-script
Clear your cache in the "Administration Control Panel" (ACP) > "General" > "Purge the cache"
Refresh your Styles: "Administration Control Panel" (ACP) > "Styles" > "Templates" > each > "refresh" "Administration Control Panel" (ACP) > "Styles" > "Themes" > each > "refresh" "Administration Control Panel" (ACP) > "Styles" > "Imagesets" > each > "refresh"
